title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instructions: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions. In a separate pan, fry bacon until crispy. In a bowl, whisk together eggs and parmesan cheese. Drain spaghetti and add to the pan with bacon. Remove from heat and quickly stir in the egg mixture. Season with black pepper and serve immediately.

title: Chicken Alfredo
instructions: Cook fettuccine pasta according to package instructions. In a skillet, cook diced chicken breast until no longer pink. Add minced garlic and cook until fragrant. Stir in heavy cream and butter, then add cooked pasta. Toss until well coated. Sprinkle with parmesan cheese and serve hot.

title: Vegetable Stir-Fry
ingredients: mixed vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli, carrots, mushrooms)
instructions: Heat sesame oil in a wok or skillet over high heat. Add diced tofu and cook until golden brown. Remove tofu from the skillet. In the same skillet, stir-fry mixed vegetables, minced garlic, and ginger until tender-crisp. Return tofu to the skillet and add soy sauce. Cook for a few more minutes, then serve hot.
